attributes.action: Get the Edge forum to remove the IP block on Ronaldinho and the H10 Plaza Catalunya in Barcelona.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ronaldinho was unfairly banned by the staff at Edge Online. His account was hijacked and he is now paying the consequences.

Mr Blair, get Ron back on Edge, it needs him!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
